Title: Microsoft 365: Create Dynamic rule-based backup policies for Microsoft 365 Backup
Description:
Create backup policies for your OneDrive and Exchange data based on distribution lists and security groups memberships, and have the tool automatically update these policies based on dynamic membership changes. Updated May 2025 to change the rollout start date from June 2025 to April 2025.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025
